attributes.action: Fireeworks to be banned from public sales and only to be used at public displays
attributes.background:
Fireworks should be banned from public sales. 
They are so dangerous!
some people don't know how dangerous they are and think they are toys!

They should only be allowed to be bought if they are having a controlled public display! Not for people to use in their backyard!

rejection.details:
We already have three petitions on the subject of restricting the sale of fireworks:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109702

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109111

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/110683
